description:
Makabe Kazuki is very quiet which makes it seem like he has a cold personality, but he is in fact a very kind and sincere character. He lives with his father Fumihiko who he gets along with very well. Kazuki has a fear of hurting those around him, which causes him to distance himself from everybody - even his friends.
He became the pilot of the Fafner Mark Erf two years ago, when he was forced to battle with the Festum.
name: Makabe Kazuki
